question: when did the legal drinking age changed to 21
vanilla_rag_result: The legal drinking age was changed to 21 in New York effective December 1, 1985, and in Wisconsin effective September 1, 1986, as part of the compliance with the National Minimum Drinking Age Act of 1984. By mid-1988, all 50 states and the District of Columbia had raised their purchase ages to 21.
